name: Steve Castella
description:
I recently just turned 55yrs old and I have been single for a pretty long while now. I am stepping back out into the scene to see what’s out there. I have come to a point in my life where I want to have a woman by my side and all the happiness I can get from life. It is the most important quest for me right now; meeting that special someone and sharing our lives together. I dream of a strong harmonious relationship based on love, trust, spiritual closeness, mutual understanding and tranquility. I am seeking a kindred spirit, an equal someone, reliable partner and real lady who wants to have a good man and partner next to her, anytime, any-day for e-v-e-r. I’ve realized what I want in a relationship, however, on the other hand, I understand it can be very fragile at times. I am not interested in flings, friends with benefits, one night stands, neither am I the one to join a couple in bed. If your purpose here fall between any of the above listed or any related motive, please do NOT bother writing me. Good luck with your search! 🙂
lets text if interested
